item.title: More Older Adults to Get RSV Vaccine During April
item.description: During April, adults aged 80 and over and care home residents in England will be offered RSV vaccination, alongside eligibility for 75-year-olds. Meds...

item.title: Higher Rates of EOE, Food Allergy Mostly in White Male Teens
item.description: Better adherence to guidelines for food allergen introduction to infants may improve incidence of EoE and food allergy. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Tethered to Tech, Nurses Suffer Digital Compassion Fatigue
item.description: The explosion of telehealth, remote monitoring, and screen-based charting is leading to digital compassion fatigue for nurses. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Wildfire Smoke During Late Pregnancy Linked to Autism Risk
item.description: Prenatal exposure to wildfire smoke during the third trimester may increase the risk for autism in offspring, a new study suggests. Medscape Medical N...

item.title: Model Predicts Recurrent C difficile Infection Risk in IBD
